statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT product_id, product_name, movement_pattern FROM warehouse_layout WHERE demand_level > 3;
SELECT product_name, shelf_location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE shelf_location = 'A1';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(product_name) FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE demand_level > 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, shelf_location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE demand_level <= 3 ORDER BY shelf_location DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE movement_pattern = 'Fast' ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE shelf_location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY demand_level ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, movement_pattern FROM warehouse_layout WHERE demand_level > 2 AND shelf_location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY demand_level DESC, shelf_location
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT location_id, aisle, shelf, bin FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT * FROM movement_patterns WHERE movement_type='Inbound';
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT aisle FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY aisle ASC, shelf DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle = 'A' AND shelf = 2;
SELECT * FROM movement_patterns WHERE movement_type = 'Inbound' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouse_layout GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT aisle, COUNT(DISTINCT shelf) AS unique_shelves FROM warehouse_layout GROUP BY aisle;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 0 GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, movement_date FROM movement_patterns WHERE movement_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM movement_patterns WHERE from_location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC, warehouse_id;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT movement_id, product_id, movement_date FROM movement_patterns WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout JOIN movement_patterns ON warehouse_layout.warehouse_id = movement_patterns.product_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE total_capacity > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE weight < 10;
SELECT movement_id, product_id, warehouse_id FROM movement_patterns ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT demand_id, quantity, demand_date FROM demand WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE total_capacity > 1000;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, weight FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT demand_id, quantity, demand_date FROM demand WHERE quantity >= 50 ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT movement_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity_moved, movement_date FROM movement_patterns WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity_moved DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_products;
SELECT product_name, demand_rating FROM warehouse_products WHERE demand_rating > 3;
SELECT location_name, aisle_number, bay_number FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location_id = 5 AND quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, movement_id, movement_date FROM product_movement WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_products WHERE demand_rating > 3 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, movement_pattern FROM warehouse_products JOIN product_movement ON warehouse_products.product_id = product_movement.product_id WHERE movement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, aisle_number, bay_number FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY aisle_number, bay_number DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM warehouse_products JOIN demand_forecast ON warehouse_products.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM warehouse_products JOIN warehouse_layout ON warehouse_products.product_id = warehouse_layout.product_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
